meanings.sent1: The breeding of rabbits resulted in many baby bunnies.

meanings.definition: The mating and production of offspring by animals
meanings.sent1: The breeding season for birds is a busy time for them.

meanings.definition: The raising and training of animals

meanings.sent5: The breeding of racehorses demands a deep understanding of equine behavior.

meanings.definition: The producing of plants by controlling pollination and fertilization

meanings.sent2: Genetic engineering has revolutionized the breeding of crops.
meanings.sent3: The gardeners were proud of their successful breeding of rare orchids.
meanings.sent4: The breeding of fruit trees requires careful attention to cross-pollination.
